titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for bringing in the arreares of the assessements for the army, within the city of London and liberties thereof. With the names of the persons in each ward appointed for executing the same. Die Lunæ, 24 April. 1648. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Ioh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the old Bayley
